page.title: 18TYPICAL HOUSING
page.content: Breightmet Hill was once one big house but it is now split into 3 terraced houses. I live in the middle one of the three. At the back there are 3 rooms downstairs. They are about 200 years old and two of them have beams in them.The other 2 rooms are about 500 years old. The reason it is different ages is because some of it burnt down aboyt 200 year ago. The attic had to be completely rebuilt as did all but three of the bedrooms. 79 Burnmoor Rd. This dormer bungalow has a big garden with swings. It has 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. Two bedrooms are upstairs and one down. The windows are double glazed, and the whole house has central heating. We also have a gas fire in the lounge. The garage and shed are joined, and there is a greenhouse in the garden.
